author: Sundaresh Menon JC
casename: Abdul Aziz bin Mohamed Yatim v Rubiah bte Rahmat
counsel: Soraya Hafsa bte Ibrahim (Soraya H Ibrahim & Co) for the appellants; Mohamed Hashim (Mohamed Hashim & Madelene Sng) for the first respondent
tags-parsed: Contempt of Court/Civil contempt/Whether civil contempt proceedings pending against contemnor may be continued against contemnor's personal representative after death of contemnor/Section 10(1) Civil Law Act (Cap 43, 1999 Rev Ed), O 15 r 6A, O 15 r 7 Rules of Court (Cap 322, R 5, 2006 Rev Ed)

Contempt of Court/Civil contempt/Whether order of court enforceable by committal proceedings against third party who was actively involved in contemnor's breach/Whether committal proceedings against third party may commence and continue even after death of contemnor
